od.oracle.apps.xxom.atp.thread
Class ThreadPool

java.lang.Object
  od.oracle.apps.xxom.atp.thread.ThreadPool

public class ThreadPool
extends java.lang.Object

Creates and maitains a ThreadPool for the set of work to be done. Invokes the corresponding workers as per the request arrival.
